name: Drop A Prop
description:
Made for Mini Jame Gam #9

A prototype of a somewhat rage game where you drop some props...

It was initially not meant to be a rage game, but due to Unity's way of handling Reflection of lasers, you have to get everything perfectly to complete a level.

As said above the Lasers are a bit buggy, so please don't get too irritated :)

Also, i'm sorry for the low amount of levels... I already lost a lot of time and chose Quality > Quantity.
